project_overview.name: Customer Onboarding and Success Portal (COSP)
project_overview.description: A web-based portal that will improve customer onboarding, adoption, and self-service capabilities.

feature_breakdown.description: Allow customers to securely log in using their main SaaS product credentials.
acceptance_criteria: Successful login using main SaaS credentials

feature_breakdown.description: Display a personalized onboarding checklist based on the customer's subscription level.
acceptance_criteria: Accurate display of onboarding tasks per subscription level

feature_breakdown.description: Integrate with the existing knowledge base API to allow seamless content searching and viewing.
acceptance_criteria: Successful integration with knowledge base API
Smooth content search and viewing experience

feature_breakdown.description: Display a dashboard showing the customer's adoption metrics (e.g., daily active users, feature usage count).
acceptance_criteria: Accurate display of key customer adoption metrics

feature_breakdown.description: Provide a 'Contact CSM' button that pre-populates an email or a Zendesk ticket with customer details.
acceptance_criteria: Successful pre-population of customer details in email/ticket
Seamless integration with CRM and ticketing system

integration_points: Main SaaS Product API (for SSO and usage data)
technical_architecture.data_flow: User requests -> Load balancer -> Web app frontend -> Application backend -> Database/APIs -> Response to user
security_considerations: Enforce access controls and role-based permissions
Implement input validation and sanitization to prevent common web vulnerabilities

implementation_phases.description: Deliver the core functionality of the COSP within 6 months.
deliverables: Integrated knowledge base search and viewing

implementation_phases.description: Enhance the COSP with additional features and improvements.

risk_analysis.description: Integrating with multiple third-party APIs may cause delays or compatibility issues.
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Thoroughly research and test API integrations during the design phase. Implement robust error handling and fallback mechanisms.

risk_analysis.description: Delivering the MVP within the 6-month timeline may be challenging due to the complexity of the features.
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Prioritize features, break down development into smaller, manageable tasks, and closely monitor progress. Consider adjusting the scope if necessary.

risk_analysis.description: Maintaining high performance and scalability may be difficult, especially during peak usage periods.
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Implement caching, load balancing, and other performance optimization techniques. Regularly monitor and test the system's scalability.

success_metrics.target_value: Decrease by 5 percentage points within 12 months
success_metrics.measurement_method: Analyze customer retention data from the main SaaS product

success_metrics.target_value: Reduce from 30 days to 14 days within 6 months
success_metrics.measurement_method: Track the time between a customer's first login and their first feature adoption

success_metrics.target_value: Reduce time spent on manual onboarding tasks by 25%
success_metrics.measurement_method: Monitor CSM productivity and time allocation before and after COSP deployment

success_metrics.target_value: Increase to 40% of support questions resolved via the portal
success_metrics.measurement_method: Analyze support ticket data and portal usage metrics
